common

Interface IDefender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FanDefender

    public interface IDefender
    Author:
    alex

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateDefenderPosition(double d1, double w1, double w2)
      This method will calculate the ideal defender position for this strategy.
      void defend()
      This method will open one side of the fan.
      void orient()
      This method will rotate the robot to the heading needed for this defense strategy.
      void stop()
      This method will close one side of the fan.

    • Method Detail

      • orient

        void orient()
        This method will rotate the robot to the heading needed for this defense strategy. This requires that the robot be in the correct position.

      • defend

        void defend()
        This method will open one side of the fan.

      • stop

        void stop()
        This method will close one side of the fan.

      • calculateDefenderPosition

        void calculateDefenderPosition(double d1,
                             double w1,
                             double w2)
        This method will calculate the ideal defender position for this strategy. The calculated position should then be requested from the navigator before calling orient and defend.
        Parameters:
        d1 - Distance of offensive line. Taken from instructions.
        w1 - Width of defensive line. Taken from instructions.
        w2 - Distance of defensive line. Taken from instructions.
